page.title: 17THE TRAIN SERVICE, THWAITES
page.content: The railway station in our area is called Green Road Station. It is an unmanned station. Eleven trains pass through it towards Millom every day, except Sunday when no passenger trains travel on this line. The line goes from Barrow to Carlisle. Some trains only go as far as Millom, others go to Carlisle. On Monday to Friday 13 trains go through Green Road Station towards Barrow. On Saturday, 11 go to Barrow and there are no passenger trains on Sunday. 23% of households interviewed said they regularly used the train service from Green Road Station. Of this 23%, a half of the people used it for shopping, 30% used it for work and 20% used it for visiting people. If you want the train to stop you have to signal to the driver.
